strapiPost.title: Livesay Orchards Is Our Pick For Your Weekend Activity
strapiPost.content:
A day trip to Livesay Orchards will keep you and the family entertained.

  • Century of tradition: The Livesay farm was founded in 1920 and offers the Tulsa community with a fall harvest in a real pumpkin patch. Open all weekends and select fall days, they have hayrides, an epic corn maze, and pumpkin and apple picking.
  • Fall harvest: Pre-purchasing your tickets are preferred for the pumpkin patch and apple picking. The corn maze this year is of baseball player Frank Linzy - 1956 Porter graduate and MLB legend.

The last day of harvest is Oct. 30, you can learn more HERE.
